ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the Skull of Jhen Tra (or whatever its called) and i have two staff segments. maybe this is what gets combined.  what do ya ll think?  i have seen
ygData.messageBody:
I have the Skull of Jhen'Tra (or whatever its called) and i have two staff
segments. maybe this is what gets combined. what do ya'll think? i have seen
nothing on the staff segments. got one off a bandit in east karana and the other
in a lockbox in highpass hold (bandit has the key). Been trying to find out what
the segments are for and how to combine.


DBellassai@... wrote:

> From: DBellassai@...
>
> Hmm ive heard that to but i talk to a friend on the pvp server and he says
> he seen the finished product. I dont think he was making it up casue he
> confronted me about tinkering and asked if i new how to make one. Also ive
> been to a few web sittes that kinda talk about it. Its mentioned that there
> is a third componet to combine to make this staff. To bad they wouldnt say,
> also the priest discord has that black robe. When i first started i thought
> it was just for show but the higher i get in levels i starting to see other
> people wear this robe. You can get that robe in a dungeon. I also tried to
> combine the skull and rune totum staff and it tells me that they dont
> combine.
>
